com.navis.framework.persistence

Class DefaultSessionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.HibernateExceptionTranslator
      • org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.AbstractSessionFactoryBean
        • org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.LocalSessionFactoryBean
          • com.navis.framework.persistence.DefaultSessionFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISecondLevelCacheConfigurationAware, IReloadableSessionFactory, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanClassLoaderAware, org.springframework.beans.factory.DisposableBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.FactoryBean<org.hibernate.SessionFactory>, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.dao.support.PersistenceExceptionTranslator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeneratorOverrideSessionFactory

    public class DefaultSessionFactory
extends org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.LocalSessionFactoryBean
implements ISecondLevelCacheConfigurationAware, IReloadableSessionFactory
    Carina extensions which allow dynamic listing of hbm file mappings and postinitializer call backs. Please keep this as uncluttered as possible.

    DO NOT PUT stuff in here which belongs in a post initializer or upgrade action

      • executeSchemaStatement

        protected void executeSchemaStatement(java.sql.Statement inStmt,
                                      java.lang.String inSql)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Execute the given schema SQL on the given JDBC Statement.

        Note that the default implementation will log unsuccessful statements and continue to execute. We override this method to treat failures differently.

        Overrides:
        executeSchemaStatement in class org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.LocalSessionFactoryBean
        Parameters:
        inStmt - the JDBC Statement to execute the SQL on
        inSql - the SQL statement to execute
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if thrown by JDBC methods (and considered fatal)

      • postProcessConfiguration

        protected void postProcessConfiguration(org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration inConfig)
                                 throws org.hibernate.HibernateException
        We use our own connection provider which propagates the isolation levels

        note cglib setting here is too late since hibernate spring anti-coding ignores this
